work.summary: Environmental services company working in its digital transformation.
highlights: Contributed to services aimed to integrate all company products, like single sign-on, i18n and organizational structures management, using technologies like Node.js, React, GraphQL, MongoDB and Neo4j.
Effectively implemented with my team the first CQRS architecture in the company using Kafka.
Build a ambitious system to manage and monitor IoT assets related to water resources management with tech stack including React, Node.js, MongoDB, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Spark and Airflow.

work.summary: Sports games and apps development company that works with the NBA and several well-known soccer clubs.
highlights: Build, from zero to one, an application for a famous football team including news feed, real-time match stats and gamification among other features.

work.summary: Community platform for sharing recipes that has a large mass users around the world.
highlights: Worked with an international team, formed by people from Beirut to Indonesia.
Contributed to the Android application and a bit to the Ruby on Rails backend.

work.summary: Real Estate company focused on giving the best experience for its clients through the use of new technologies.
highlights: Build a SEO-friendly server-side rendering website and strong backend services using Node.js and MongoDB.
Improved staff productivity developing features like alerts, third-party integrations, add-ons for the internal CRM/CMS built with Angular.js.
